    <metadata>

            <entry>cahi1:data_8152280913aad2eb87de30ba1d9c5d938746f7c2</entry>

          <title>
            <string language="en">Expansion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Expansion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Expansion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Expansão</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Espansione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επέκταση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Extensión</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows what happens to the particles when matter expand. They move further apart.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">particle model</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, was den Partikeln 
geschieht, wenn Stoff erweitern. Sie ziehen weiter auseinander 
um.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre ce qui arrive aux 
particules quand la matière augmentent. Elles se déplacent 
plus loin à part.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o que acontece às 
partículas quando a matéria expande. Movem-se mais mais 
distante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra che cosa accade alle 
particelle quando la materia si espande. Si muovono più 
ulteriormente a parte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τι συμβαίνει στα μόρια 
όταν επεκτείνεται το θέμα. Κινούνται περαιτέρω χώρια.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra qué sucede a las 
partículas cuando la materia se amplía. Se mueven más lejos 
aparte.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Partikelmodell</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">modèle de particules</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">modelo da partícula</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">modello della particella</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μοντέλο μορίων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">modelo de la partícula</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
